mistral:7b-instruct: This PPO plan from nib Health Funds offers comprehensive coverage for your health conditions, including hospitalization, outpatient services, and prescription drugs. With a coverage of $750,000, it provides substantial financial support for managing complex conditions like hypertension, diabetes, heart disease, and ischemic stroke. The monthly premium of $420 and a maximum out-of-pocket expense of $6000 make this plan affordable within your middle income bracket, ensuring necessary healthcare services are accessible to you. However, it's essential to note that cosmetic procedures and experimental treatments are not included in this plan. Always consult with your doctor for personalized advice regarding your health insurance needs.
